snippet.title: Air Conflicts for the PSP tries your eyes, and your patience
snippet.description: ...When I saw the bullet points for Air Conflicts I was intrigued: US, English, German missions, real planes, bombing missions... it sounded like just the thing the PSP needed. It didn't take long... in and out of the game as quickly as possible. What Air Conflicts offers is a black screen between missions...
